item.title: Point in Time Recovery is now available for Pro projects
item.description: We're making PITR available for more projects, with a new Dashboard UI that makes it simple to use.

item.title: Continuous PostgreSQL Backups using WAL-G
item.description: Have you ever wanted to restore your database's state to a particular moment in time? This post explains how, using WAL-G.

item.title: What are PostgreSQL Templates?
item.description: What are PostgreSQL templates and what are they used for?

item.title: Physical vs Logical Backups in PostgreSQL
item.description: What are physical and logical backups in Postgres?
